Package org.knime.core.node.port.database

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseConnectionPortObject
    Port object that holds a database connection (without any query).
    DatabaseConnectionPortObject.Serializer
    Serializer used to save DatabaseConnectionPortObjects.
    DatabaseConnectionPortObjectSpec
    Specification for a database connection port.
    DatabaseConnectionPortObjectSpec.Serializer
    A serializer for DatabaseConnectionPortObjectSpecs.
    DatabaseConnectionSettings  
    DatabaseConnectionView
    The database connection port view.
    DatabaseDriverLoader
    Utility class to load additional drivers from jar and zip to the DriverManager.
    DatabaseDriverLoaderTest  
    DatabasePortObject
    Class used as database port object holding a BufferedDataTable and a ModelContentRO to create a database connection.
    DatabasePortObject.Serializer
    Serializer used to save DatabasePortObject.
    DatabasePortObjectSpec
    Class used as database port object holding a DataTableSpec and a ModelContentRO to create a database connection.
    DatabasePortObjectSpec.Serializer  
    DatabaseQueryConnectionSettings  
    DatabaseReaderConnection Deprecated
    use DatabaseUtility.getReader(DatabaseQueryConnectionSettings) instead
    DatabaseUtility
    This class is the entry point for database specific routines and information.
    DatabaseWrappedDriver
    Wraps an java.sql.Driver object.
    DatabaseWriterConnection Deprecated
    use DatabaseUtility.getWriter(DatabaseConnectionSettings) instead
    DB2Utility
    Database utility for IBM DB2.
    MySQLUtility
    Database utility for MySQL.
    OracleUtility
    Database utility for Oracle.
    PostgreSQLUtility
    Database utility for PostgreSQL.
    SQLiteUtility
    Database utility for SQLite.
    SQLServerUtility
    Database utility for MS SQL Server.
    StatementManipulator
    This class lets you manipulate SQL statement by adding database-specific parts or changing statement parameters.
